column5: PXS Looks like I will have this stock till fall ugh until then PXSPOS lol

PXS strongest shipper out there Confident that we will all easily triple our money by eoy if we can keep strong hands here the sky is the limit Low float 80 inside ownership and a true book value of 2 its a winning formula every time Just wish we could get the investors from TOPS to stop bleeding money over there and bring the volume over here Better opportunity to make money I still own TOPS myself and keep hoping the next day will get better if we make it a group effort and jump ship to PXS we can recoup our losses much quicker Just a thought
PXS also just bought in a small amount Im looking forward to see where this ends up
PXS swiped a position small here at 105 Looking at momentum for shippers Chart has history of spikes and has a small float
